Home.SelectUSBDrive: Select A USB Drive or Directory
Home.RecommendedUSBFlashDriveNonNav: Non Navigation APIM's should be fine with 8GB
Home.RecommendedUSBFlashDriveNA: NA, ROW and ANZ APIM's will require atleast 16GB
Home.RecommendedUSBFlashDriveEU: EU APIM's will require at least 32GB
About.Documentation: To ensure that the documentation is always up to date please refer to the below webpage, if you are interested in translating this to your own language you can find additional information at the same page.
About.Disclaimer: CyanLabs will not be liable for any loss or damage including, without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any loss or damage whatsoever arising from use or loss of use of, data, or profits, arising out of or in connection with the use of this application or the associated guides. This process is not approved by any vehicle manufacturer and may void any warranty/agreement you may have in place
About.DisclaimerAgreement: I understand and accept the risks outlined in the disclaimer above.
Settings.EnterRegionNav: Enter your REGION and specify if you have NAVIGATION
Settings.Warning:
INCORRECT INFORMATION MAY RENDER
YOUR APIM TEMPORARILY OR PERMANENTLY UNUSABLE
Settings.LicenseKeyInfo: Enter your license key below to gain access to any custom packages you have purchased!
MessageBox.DisclaimerNotAccepted: Please read and accept the disclaimer before continuing. You will not be able to continue unless you agree to the terms.
MessageBox.DownloadPathChangeCopy: Would you like to move existing files from {0} to {1}
MessageBox.NoDownloads: There is currently nothing in your download queue, visit the main page to choose what to download.
MessageBox.CancelNoUSB: No USB drive selected would you like to continue with just the download?
MessageBox.CancelNoUSBForced: No USB drive selected! You must select a USB drive to continue!
MessageBox.CancelMy20:
Syn3 Updater has set the install mode to {0}
DO NOT CONTINUE IF YOU HAVE A CAR MANUFACTURED IN 2020!

IF YOU CONTINUE AND HAVE A CAR MANUFACTURED IN 2020 YOU WILL BRICK YOUR CAR!

By clicking "Yes" you understand the above warning and confirm you do not have a car manufactured in 2020!
MessageBox.CancelMy20Final:
FINAL WARNING!

By clicking "Yes" you confirm you do not have a car manufactured in 2020!
MessageBox.CancelRegionMismatch:
The current region and your selected region do not match, this may not work!
Would you like to continue anyway?
MessageBox.CancelDownloadIsDrive: Download path and destination USB drive are the same, please change your download path or select another USB drive.
MessageBox.CancelNoApps: Selected InstallMode is reformat or downgrade but no "APPS" package has been selected but Syn3 Updater has determined that a downgrade or reformat is required, this will result in a non booting system. Aborting!
MessageBox.DownloadInProgress: Another operation is already running, please wait for the existing operation to finish before continuing.
MessageBox.CopyVerificationFailed: Failed to successfully validate the copied file after 3 attempts, ensure USB drive and port are functioning correctly and/or try another USB drive. Aborting process!
MessageBox.DownloadVerificationFailed: Failed to successfully validate the downloaded file after 3 attempts, Check your internet connection and try again. Aborting process!
MessageBox.DownloadOnlyComplete: All files downloaded and validated successfully, no copying has been done!
MessageBox.FailedToValidate3: Failed to validate {0} 3 times, ABORTING PROCESS!
MessageBox.WebException: Failed to connect to the download server, {0}
MessageBox.UpdateCurrentversion: Would you like to update the "Current Version" from {0} to {1} so that it is correct for future use?
MessageBox.Completed:
The Download and Copying of all required files is now complete.
Simply eject the USB from your computer insert it in to your car.
Turn the engine on, and wait for the install process to begin!

Syn3Updater will now open you directly to the relevant part of the CyanLabs tutorial for you to follow in your car.

If you are having issues join our discord or community forum, links can be found on our website.

If Syn3 Updater has been useful to you please consider donating from the "About" tab.
MessageBox.LogUtilityComplete:
Preparation of the Interrogator (Logging) USB Drive completed successfully!

Remove the USB drive from your computer and insert it in to your car, ensure the ignition is on and wait a few moments for it to say "Installation Complete" 

Re-insert the USB drive in to your pc and press "Step 3"
Utility.CreateLogDesc: Create a special USB drive used to generate a log file with various details relating to your unit, follow the steps below to get started.
Utility.CreateLogStep2:
2. Insert drive in car
await "Install Complete"
MessageBox.UpdateCurrentVersionUtility: We have detected that the version installed does not match your currently selected version in the settings, would you like to automatically update this from {0} to {1}
MessageBox.LogUtilityInvalidFile: The XML file you have selected could not be read, please ensure this is the correct file. If you are sure this file is correct please contact CyanLabs so we can investigate further.
Utility.GracenotesRemovalDesc: Use this function to create a USB to force the removal of Gracenotes from your unit.
MessageBox.GenericUtilityComplete:
Preparation of the USB Drive completed successfully!

Remove the USB drive from your computer and insert it in to your car, ensure the ignition is on and wait a few moments for it to say "Installation Complete"
Utility.VoiceShrinkerTitle: Create Small Voice Package Replacement USB
Utility.VoiceShrinkerDesc: Use this function if after removing gracenotes you are still having MEM_ERR's.
Utility.DowngradeDesc: Use this function if after removing gracenotes and shrinking your voice package you are still getting MEM_ERR's
Utility.TroubleshootDesc: Use the below functions to troubleshoot and resolve various MEM_ERR's that you may receive.
About.Endorsed: This software nor CyanLabs is licensed or endorsed by Ford/FoMoCo
MessageBox.AsBuiltVinWarning:
WARNING: This will submit your vehicles VIN along to our automatic online decoding service, by submitting your VIN this will help increase the accuracy of our database. 

If you do not wish to submit your VIN click Cancel.
MessageBox.UploadLog:
To assist in troubleshooting any potential issues we would recommend uploading your Syn3Updater log to our database, this log file contains details on what options were selected.

If you choose not to upload this log you can do so at a later date from the "Utility" tab and clicking the "Upload Log" button.

Do you want to upload your log now?
MessageBox.UploadLogNoDrive: The USB Drive you have selected does not contain a log.txt file
MessageBox.ChangeApplicationReleaseBranc:
Changing branch will restart Syn3 Updater and automatically download the relevant build.

Changing from Ci to Beta/Release may result in unhandled exceptions and require you to reset your settings!

Refer to the documentation for further information

Are you sure you want to change the 'Release Branch' of Syn3 Updater?
MessageBox.CompletedFolder:
The Download and Copying of all required files is now complete.

As you have selected a directory rather than a USB drive you will need to copy the contents of your chosen directory to a ExFAT (MBR) formatted USB drive

If you are having issues join our discord or community forum, links can be found on our website.

If Syn3 Updater has been useful to you please consider donating from the "About" tab.
MessageBox.CancelDownloadIsFolder: The selected download directory and destination directory are the same, you must change one of these directories to continue.
MessageBox.NoVersionOrRegionSelected: You have not set your current Version or Region!
MessageBox.My20Detected:
Syn3 Updater has detected that you are trying to force the install mode or disable 'My20 Mode' however a MY20 or newer APIM was previously detected! By doing this and using the created USB drive on a MY20 or newer APIM YOU WILL BRICK IT!!

By clicking 'Yes' you will disable all MY20 protection methods embedded in Syn3 Updater

Are you sure you want to change this install mode?
MessageBox.My20Check:
WARNING, ANSWERING INCORRECTLY COULD RESULT IN YOUR APIM BEING BRICKED!

Is you car manufactured in 2020 or newer?

If it is or you are unsure click 'Yes' and Syn3 Updater will guide you through running the official 'interrogator tool' to validate if you have a MY20 APIM or not

If it is 2019 or older, click 'No' to continue as planned.
MessageBox.My20Found: Syn3 Updater has determined that your APIM is MY20 (Manufacture Year 2020) or newer, Syn3 Updater will now enforce autoinstall mode to prevent possible bricking of the APIM!
MessageBox.My20NotFound: Syn3 Updater has determined that your APIM is NOT MY20 and it is safe to use all functions of Syn3 Updater
MessageBox.LogUtilityCompleteMy20:
Preparation of the Interrogator (Logging) USB Drive completed successfully!

Remove the USB drive from your computer and insert it in to your car, ensure the ignition is on and wait a few moments for it to say "Installation Complete" or for the APIM to reboot.

Once done re-insert the USB drive in to your pc, click 'OK' and select the XML file from your SyncMyRide folder of your USB drive
